name: Crusher (WallOfMouthes)
description:
CRUSHER

Can you tell I made this in 2 days?
Made for the KO!! Slam-Jam
Fullscreen Recommended. Link to Firefox Fix. Recommend reading the description.
This game also contains a lot of reading.

GOAL:

There are 3 Days to complete, with new elements being added each day. Each day takes 120 seconds (Jam theme).

The Crusher - The monitor at the center of the front wall, press space when looking at it to slam it (Jam theme(?)) on any car that's comes beneath it. You will have to time it.

The Telephone - People will ask questions that can be answered by looking at the posters on the back wall. Questions will probably repeat, so memorise them.

Gary - Talkative Co-worker that you are forced to listen to. You can sneak off and do your job but over time he will notice. Try not to look away from him for long.

The Computer - Hackers will try to intercept the computer. Mash your keyboard to ward them off when an attack happens.

Walking Controls: - WASD to move - Space to interact (or crush when looking at crusher) Telephone Controls: - W and S to select response - A or D to exit screen - Space to select Computer Controls: - Any letter to fight back - Space to exit
